name: fschmtt/keycloak-rest-api-client-php
description: PHP client to interact with Keycloak's Admin REST API.

scripts.ecs: docker compose run --rm --no-deps php vendor/bin/ecs check src tests
scripts.ecs:fix: docker compose run --rm --no-deps php vendor/bin/ecs check --fix src tests
scripts.phpstan: docker compose run --rm --no-deps php vendor/bin/phpstan analyze src tests
scripts.psalm: docker compose run --rm --no-deps php vendor/bin/psalm src
scripts.test:unit: docker compose run --rm --no-deps php vendor/bin/phpunit --testsuite unit
scripts.test:integration: docker compose run --rm --no-deps php vendor/bin/phpunit --testsuite integration

scripts-descriptions.test:integration: Run integration tests (requires a fresh and running Keycloak instance)
